Articles.Content:
This is my latest mega build, inspired by Helicarrier from Avengers movie

![MQe5lBa.png](http://i.imgur.com/MQe5lBa.png)

The elevator to the lower deck in the middle:

![K8hxrCC.png](http://i.imgur.com/K8hxrCC.png)

Lower deck for planes

![PoW3Ppv.png](http://i.imgur.com/PoW3Ppv.png)

Took 2 days to build this one, 1 more day for final tweaking is needed tho, but it works ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Have managed to land the jet on it.

----

twitch.tv/myslius
What mod or plugin was used?
Looks like InfiniteDice's BoatParts for the middle deck and the lift, as well as the hooks. I don't recognize the fans.

> 
> Looks like InfiniteDice's BoatParts for the middle deck and the lift, as well as the hooks. I don't recognize the fans.

The fans themselves look like FTT. I'm not sure what's making the thicker cowlings around them.
the thicker cowlings are B9 procedural parts
